title: Virus
desc:
Post 1805
- When used, you are inflicted with **Gloom** 1 and the next player draws (1805) Virus.
- Whenever your turn ends and this is still in your hand, a random non-<:gloom:1187518684143550605> card gets the <:gloom:1187518684143550605> color added to it. If there are none, you get **Gloom** 1 instead.
- This cannot be played on other copies of (1805) Virus.
- At the end of the round, if this is in the Discard Pile, it will send itself into a random player's hand.
